attributes.action: give british ship builders an order for a new bigger and better royal yacht  ( please read why )
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we where all told by the government that the royal yacht was costing british tax payers £35 million pounds a year to keep affloat , what the government failed to tell us all , was when the royal yacht docked in other countries ,invites where given to all major business men and women of that country to attend a banquet on the royal yacht , no business men or women refused , they where then greated by the queen , who then proceeded to wine and dine them with business men and women from british companies , on one trip alone the queen was directly responsible for bringing over 1 billion pounds worth of orders into britain . now do you think its a waste of money . think about it !!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
